Title: Charles-Hubert Paris Two-Tone Mechanical Pocket Watch NEW
Description: Home Shop About Us Policies Contact Us Charles-Hubert, Paris Two-Tone Mechanical Pocket Watch Traditional yet timely in its own way, this two-tone brass finished pocket watch is a must-have. It features precise engineering, thanks to 17 jewel mechanical movement. A white-trim skeleton dial has black Roman numeral hour indicators for clarity and crisp details. Skeleton dial. Roman numerals. 17 jewel mechanical movement. Comes with deluxe gift box. 14k gold-plated. Two- tone brass finish. 1.85 in. Dia. Featuring a two-tone crest design on its case back, classic profile, and skeleton dial with black-tone Roman numeral hour markers, the Charles-Hubert, Paris Two-Tone Mechanical Pocket Watch 3711 is both elegant and understated. Seventeen-jewel mechanical movement ensures reliable time-keeping, while black-tone Roman numeral hour markers and three black-tone hands stand out against a creamy white background. Complete with a matching curb chain, this Charles-Hubert original arrives in a deluxe blue gift-box. See all Product description Payment PaymentPayPal is the only method of payment we accept. If you have an order cancellation request, we'll do our best to accommodate your request however we cannot guarantee that such a request will always be granted. Return Policy Return PolicyYou may return new, unopened items within 30 days of delivery for a refund, and a restocking fee may apply. Items must be returned in the condition they arrived in. The box, UPC bar code, packaging, and all other accessories must be returned. Open software, music, games, movies, food items (human or pet, opened or closed), and personal hygiene products are not eligible for return. An RMA number is required for all returns. Message us for return instructions. Items returned without a RMA number will not be processed. Return shipping fees are not refundable. We reserve the right to decline any returns if the above guidelines are not followed. Shipping ShippingEconomy shipping is free and is the only shipping speed/method we have available. Your order will be processed within 3 business days after your payment. Transit time varies from 1-10 business days. Regardless of shipping date, you will receive it near the eBay estimated delivery date, almost always. We do not accept emailed requests to change shipping addresses. We do not ship to AK, HI, PO boxes, or APO addresses. We are not responsible for any incorrect or undeliverable addresses. We only ship to the confirmed Paypal address. Please note that manufactures update their packaging from time to time and that the packaging images shown in our auction may vary from what you ultimately receive however be assured you are receiving the identical contents you ordered regardless. Sales Tax Sales TaxWe have warehouse processing centers across the country to ensure you receive your package efficiently and as quickly as possible. As a result, we are required to charge sales tax in multiple states across the USA. If your state is one that we charge sales tax in, you will see the sales tax charge at time of checkout before you submit payment. Customer Service Customer ServiceDo you have a question about an item or order? Contact us via eBay messaging and we will respond within 1 business day. Our office hours are 8AM-4PM PST Monday-Friday. We only respond to emails sent via eBay's messaging service. Invoices or special request are not guaranteed. We do not accept best offers on any items we sell. If there are any issues with your transaction please contact before leaving a neutral or negative feedback as we are certain we can produce an amicable resolution for the both of us. We would love to be given the opportunity to work with you to resolve any problem you may have. Home Shop About Us Policies Contact Us Copyright © 2016 Shop, Sale, Save.
